sqls.sql: select ifs.ID,ifs.FILE_NAME,ifs.FILE_TYPE,ifs.PROCESSING_START,ifs.PROCESSING_END,ifs.RECORDS_NUM, ifs.PROCESSED_RECORDS_NUM,ifs.ERROR_RECORDS_NUM,ifs.SAVED_RECORDS_NUM,ifs.STATUS,ifs.CREATED_DT from iaismstr.dbo.input_files ifs where 1=1 <#if fileName??> AND CHARINDEX(:fileName, ifs.FILE_NAME) > 0 </#if> <#if fileType??> AND CHARINDEX(:fileType, ifs.FILE_TYPE) > 0 </#if> <#if status??> AND CHARINDEX(:status, ifs.STATUS) > 0 </#if> <#if dateFrom??> AND ifs.CREATED_DT >= convert(date, :dateFrom, 103) </#if> <#if dateTo??> AND ifs.CREATED_DT < convert(date, :dateTo, 103) </#if> <#if originalId??> AND CHARINDEX(:originalId, ifs.UPLOADED_BY) > 0 </#if>
